/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models are scattered across the road, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. In the distance, a gas station stands out with its distinctive red roof, a common sight in many parts of China. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
